ComicInfo.Title: Red Wolf
ComicInfo.Summary: Meet Johnny Wakely, the warrior Red Wolf, in his first ever appearance! And right off the bat, this hero of the American West faces personal tragedy!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 20:11:55. [CVDB11788] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:54:21. [Issue ID 24643]
ComicInfo.Writer: Gardner Fox,Gardner F. Fox,Gardner F. Fox
ComicInfo.Characters: Red Wolf [Johnny Wakely] (introduction, origin),Ned Hacker,Major Brett Sabre,Martin Wakely (introduction, death, Red Wolf's father),Emma Wakely (introduction, death, Red Wolf's mother),Lobo (a wolf),A financier (introduction, villain),Owayodata,Many Moons
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
